data.content:
Ngoại động từ
tuyển (quân...)
kết nạp vào, ghi tên cho vào (hội...)
(pháp lý) ghi vào (sổ sách toà án)

verb
US or chiefly Brit enrol -rolls; -rolled; -rolling
[+ obj] :to enter (someone) as a member of or participant in something - usually + in
They enrolled their children in a private school.
He enrolled himself in a weight-loss program. [=he joined a weight-loss program]
[+ obj] :to take (someone) as a member or participant
The college enrolls about 25,000 students.
They enrolled several volunteers for the study.
[no obj] :to become a member or participant - usually + in
After graduating from high school he enrolled in the army.
We enrolled in the history course.
